PSXDataSelector.nativeStatement: SELECT DISTINCT RXSLOTTYPE.SLOTNAME, RXSLOTTYPE.SLOTID FROM CONTENTTYPES CONTENTTYPES,RXSLOTCONTENT RXSLOTCONTENT, RXSLOTTYPE RXSLOTTYPE,CONTENTSTATUS CONTENTSTATUS WHERE CONTENTTYPES.CONTENTTYPEID = RXSLOTCONTENT.CONTENTTYPEID AND RXSLOTTYPE.SLOTID = RXSLOTCONTENT.SLOTID AND CONTENTSTATUS.CONTENTTYPEID = CONTENTTYPES.CONTENTTYPEID AND CONTENTSTATUS.CONTENTID = :"PSXSingleParam/sys_contentid"

PSXDataSet.name: Dataset221
PSXDataSet.description: Resource to get all relationship properties given a relationshipid parameter (sys_relationshipid)

PSXDataSelector.nativeStatement: SELECT DISTINCT RXSLOTTYPE.SLOTNAME, RXSLOTTYPE.SLOTID, RXSLOTTYPE.FINDER FROM PSX_TEMPLATE CV, RXVARIANTSLOTTYPE, RXSLOTTYPE, CONTENTSTATUS, PSX_CONTENTTYPE_TEMPLATE CTT WHERE CONTENTSTATUS.CONTENTTYPEID = CTT.CONTENTTYPEID AND CTT.TEMPLATE_ID = CV.TEMPLATE_ID AND CV.TEMPLATE_ID = RXVARIANTSLOTTYPE.VARIANTID AND RXVARIANTSLOTTYPE.SLOTID = RXSLOTTYPE.SLOTID AND CV.TEMPLATE_ID = :"PSXSingleParam/sys_variantid"
